message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $150. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I value this product highly, I'm willing to come down a bit to $135.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'd be willing to pay $125 for the product
